components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
If i do CUT operation on studio editor for small text its OK, 
however if its big code-text, studio crashes as soon as i select & do CTRL+X or Edit->Cut

i'm using Axway Appcelerator Studio, build: 5.0.0.201712081732

comments.body: Hey [~exandcus] thanks for the report. This looks to be a duplicate of TISTUD-8916 which is planned for the 5.1.0 release, please track any updates there!
